parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the color of the right picture of a tree item defined by path when item is selected </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control [[tvSetPictureRightColorSelected]] [path, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p2</name>=<value> [path, color]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - path to tree view item </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p4</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - color in format [r,g,b,a]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[tvSetPictureRightColorSelected]] [[0], [1,0,1,1]]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvSetText]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureRight]], [[tvSetPictureColor]], [[tvSetPictureColorSelected]], [[tvSetPictureColorDisabled]], [[tvSetPictureRightColor]], [[tvSetPictureRightColorDisabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
